input.sentences: these shoes ran their first marathon yesterday .
i helped make sure the kids marathon ran smoothly | as they gathered at registration .
the kids ran hard and fast .
overall the event was a success so i took a selfie to show how pleased i was with myself .
output.sentences: Yesterday, he strapped on his new shoes and ran for charity
Travel to the race went smoothly, and after his registration it was time to begin, so he ran
He ran with the kids in  the math class that he teaches, though it was really hard
After they ran he ate with the kids
The race was a success, and he took a selfie to remember how pleased he was
